column4: i installed ubuntu on this newly bought notebook of mine yesterday and all was working good but this monring when i booted, it gave me a kernel panic
i rebooted many times but it didnt help, so i tried something very stupid: re-install grub
but the grub didn't install successfully and now even the grub doesn't load successfully
i can help a lil, i just learned how the whole grub number scheme goes ^^ (slightly proud of self*
cool, let me paste the problem i am having now
lol, i dont know how much i can help, i just learned the numbering scheme so far for the install on my gentoo box, hehe, im not sure at my abilities to help you but i will try
